jump_scares.spoiler: A silhouette runs past the camera
The father is grabbed by something behind him
A small child runs around the corner
One of the girls jumps into sight from behind the window
Isabelle jumps from behind the bench onto the bench while the lights are flickering
A dark shadow is seen by Annabel in the mirror
Lucas looks into a hole in the wall where a dark object launches out
While Annabel is sleeping, a hand stretches across her face
Mama appears in the closet when Annabel isn’t looking
Victoria tells Lilly not to look at mama, then mama flies towards Lilly when she looks back at her. [Video]
Mama appears on the ceiling in the girl’s room
Mama jumps out from a room in the hallway
